content.rendered:
The Waterberg FET College, Waterberg College Prospectus consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Waterberg College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Waterberg FET College (Waterberg College) based on the information provided within it.

  • Waterberg College Student Portal

Note: Waterberg College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Waterberg FET College Prospectus 2024

The Waterberg College Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.waterbergcollege.co.za.

  • WATERBERG COLLEGE PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD

see also Ehlanzeni College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now
